website_summaries.verdict: A strong contender with rugged four-wheel drive and a top-notch motor. An excellent option for beginners.
pros: Tough and durable without sacrificing speed
Replacement parts are easy to find
cons: Battery life can be on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be great, except wheel alignment
customer_reviews.text: This vehicle is very strong and can run on high grass. Absolutely, it is attributed to 4 wheel drive. Everything seems to be great, except wheel alignment. There was limitation to adjust toe a certain degree. Specially the rear wheel is too much toe-in condition. Battery runs about 10 min (not measured exactly) and my kids is pleasant enough with this running time. Another notice, wheel bearing, which is made of plastic. It should be more advanced one in this range of price RC vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: KWANG HYUN SONG

customer_reviews.title: awesome starter hobbyist RC for the money.
customer_reviews.text: loving this RC car so far. I have spent quite a bit on it 'hopping' it up with upgraded metal parts because the plastic ones will inevitably break when you crash it. the battery that comes with it does not last that long at all and i strongly recommend at least a spare 3800mhA battery or higher. so far i have added metal knuckles with ball bearings, metal steering linkages and servo saver, beefier steering servo, metal control arms front and rear as well as metal front and rear links lastly i got 8 all metal shocks cause i kept bending the stock ones with minor crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LaDucer

customer_reviews.title: front end problems, loses dogbone.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with your Volcano rc. I have used 3 battery packs in it, just yard, grass running, lost the first right side dogbone. Took apart put it back in. Lost the dogbone on the desk test run. After some Youtubing, saw about the plastic type bushing, make one and lost the dogbone. Bought new stainless dogbones, inserted and ran in the for 2 batteries, saw it was running with rear axle only. lost another dogbone... ordered longer dogbones... way to much work for a new car. I have a car much cheaper and has no issues... very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: budnanc

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Esc burnt out with the first few runs in a dangerous way. Throttle was stuck wide open and the car ran away. Thankfully now one got hit by it and it crashed into a wall. Electronics where burnt out and number also broke. Tons of smoke. Spur gear and pinion gear are not a standard size so replacements are not readily available. Stock one is. Stay away will not last. Plastic is brittle and will wobble at any speed. Save up a bit more and get something from a big name. I really wanted to like this truck but it will not last.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjjoeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: which is weird with a car that break up so easily. Sending it back
customer_reviews.text: Car broke down after only 6 uses. They have a compatibility chart for parts for you to look up whichever part car needs, but part for my car not listed here 😱. I try to contact the closest dealers they have in their website for this area, no one of them answers the phone, so I guess they are out of business, which is weird with a car that break up so easily. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fast car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as xmas gift, you have to know a little about the sport and the car to keep it running. My nephew (10 yrs) did not so it's sitting in his room because he unable to start it. It has a complicated battery pack and instructions are no help. It was awesome when it was working it is very fast and fun. I gave it 2 stars but it probably had to do more with our lack of knowledge of these cars and frustration with instructions. Otherwise we would be racing.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Watch the polarity!
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for the polarity! My son recharged the battery (has a very short life so buy extras!) and went to put it back into the car and he didn’t connect the red to red and black to black. Within the first five hours on Christmas morning I was buying new parts to rebuild it. The rebuild parts are taking 10 days to get. Nonetheless the kids got to enjoy the smell of an electrical fire and learned a lesson about polarity.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Most Fun RC Car EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this RC for over 6 months, and it works great! Pros. Great speed (18 mph, 29 kph). Oil filled shock suspension. Lots of parts to upgrade with. Con. Short stock battery life. I did mod the motor, battery, gears, wheels, and wheel hub after 3 months and it definitely needed to have those aluminum and steel parts once I upgraded the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Rating for description and price of what I got
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes :not new used damaged box. It's flat out used scratches on the bottom on the truck body itself missing foam body mount rings and the body pins are just bent wire tires were loose and the whole thing was dirty.Also no shock spacers no parts paperwork and it has the pro body instead. Wouldn't have paid 136 if I'd have known it was used used. Likes: it works fine it's built tough pretty quick for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: ben e.

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4x4 for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wasn't expecting much. I have a vintage Team Losi truggy and an HPI stadium truck. I've owned a Traxxas nitro T-Maxx too. For $150 (less if you get from Amazon Warehouse) this truck seems pretty solid. It can take 7.4v LiPo too. I may upgrade to the brushless motor, but who knows. Fro now it's fine and fun. Although the 4WD isn't posi. it still mobs better than my two 2WD's.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, fun but is it for you?
customer_reviews.text: Fast, fun and cool looking. Batteries it comes with suck and to charge it takes forever. Lots of plastic parts which break easy. Already had to replace the wheel mounts. Only reason I give it four stars is because it is definitely a fun hobby to upgrade the thing. Just get ready to spend $$. I recommend to hobbiest not to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Want speed and durability this is the one without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to more expensive RC cars, parts and support is very good. I had an issue with mine after a few runs and Redcat Racing was quick to respond and replaced the parts quickly. You can also upgrade the car with aftermarket parts. This is a good way to get into the RC hobby without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Este

customer_reviews.title: Great RC Car
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he has had so much playing with it. It flies down the paved road and the grass doesn't slow it down much at all. Very very happy with the purchase and we followed the recommendation to buy an additional battery. I would highly recommend that as well.* product update somehow a spring has gotten lose and now it’s not working *
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... with my dogs with this remote control car is fun! That was the primary reason for buying it
customer_reviews.text: Playing with my dogs with this remote control car is fun! That was the primary reason for buying it, to wear out 5 small dogs and it does the job! My terriers chase this all over the back yard. We have about 2/3 of an acre and this truck soars through the grass. The 4 wheel drive makes it turn fast and sharp and allows it to go through even high grass. The battery life is not the greatest (about 15 minutes), but the nice part about this truck is that essentially all of the parts are replaceable/upgrade-able. Even though it was a little on the expensive side, I think it is totally worth the cost for this fun machine!
customer_reviews.author: Juli Marie

customer_reviews.title: After three returns on other trucks for what I would call false advertising and crappy products Red Cat Really came through and
customer_reviews.text: WOW is all I can say!!!! Red Cat Racing really put a lot into this little truck!!!! VERY FAST and durable!!!! My 9yr old son LOVES this!!! After three returns on other trucks for what I would call false advertising and crappy products Red Cat Really came through and made us a believer that there is a ELEC Car/Truck out there that is fast, rugged and affordable!!! Thank you RCR!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TODD

customer_reviews.title: Fun Truck
customer_reviews.text: Have had this truck for over a month, and it has been one tough truck. It has been flipped and rolled, and survived hitting a tree head-on(don't recommend that). It broke the front bumper from the chassis and I reinstalled it with bigger screws. It's fun to drive, does some pretty decent donuts in loose gravel. Has a problem with rocks jamming the steering in gravel. You might want to invest in larger Mah battery, the one that comes with it lasts 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and affordable RC Car
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and affordable RC Car... Fast and upgradable! I'm looking for a Lipo battery to make it fly! I don't write reviews very often but this car deserve it.... Be careful if you are new in RC toys and you want to buy a longer lasting battery to choose the Banana connector one... i bought a 3000mAh with Tamiya connector but without adapter or convertor cable to Banana 4.0 and i'm now waiting for my adapter to be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Hermel

customer_reviews.title: No quality control on refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Saved about $15 (yeah not worth it) for refurbished product. Inside box was the car controller and a bunch of dirt. I thought, ok its refurbished they didnt take the time to clean the dirt off as it was on the tires mostly and in the box. After spending time setting it up I realized I cant control it because it is missing thr wire to star and the wire to ... sync it with the controller (forgot what that one was called). I didnt realize the body was so flimsy either but I'm a novice. Just spend the money on a NEW car or none at all.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great truck
customer_reviews.text: My first bigger ex vehicle. Will run on a 2s lipo with a jumper. Easily upgradable if you like to tinker but it’s quality and ready to go right out of the box. Read all the instructions to set it up to your liking. Have fun
customer_reviews.author: By JS

customer_reviews.title: Used like new dont mean its gonna work
customer_reviews.text: I figured i buy a used/like new one the price was good and it came with an additional 20% off so i couldn't pass it up, when i opened it the truck and remote were flawless never used, then i tried to drive it and got nothing everything worked but it woulnt move so i figured thats why it was returned. Since i own a blackout xte and watched lots of youtube videos on these things i figured i check it out, the motor wasnt touching the gear i just loosened one screw on the motor moved it over a little now it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog chase toy and great fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and quick one of the c clips popped loose after a run but easy enough fix. Be prepared if you wanna have any real fun to have a upgrade budget. Also great for exhausting the dog.
customer_reviews.author: james pugh

customer_reviews.title: Breaks way too often
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this less than a month, and one of the front axles pops out every five minutes. It's absolutely awful. The screws are pulling out of the plastic pieces. They do not hold together at all. Several of the screws were stripped from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A steal for the price. Fast, durable & fun!
customer_reviews.text: It's a steal for the price. Hobby grade with potential. Upgraded parts can really make this thing a serious RC. The truck is very durable considering a lot of important pieces are plastic. Many parts can be upgraded to aluminum for extra durability. Upgrade the battery asap. No need for LiPo, just get a NiMh 5000 Mah battery. It lasts for over 30 mins st full speed. It can handle just about anything you throw at it; grass, mud, a few inches of water, snow, jumps, you name it. If you crash it, it can break. If children drive it, it will break, but a good learning RC.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Winston

customer_reviews.title: Great car love it more than worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this car for almost a year and nothing has broken yet it has lost a screw but that was my fault for not tightening it.I do recommend buying a new battery the one it comes with lasts about 10 minutes.I bought 2 3800mah batterys and they last about 30mins each.other than the battery the car is great I have crashed multiple times and have yet to break anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great RC Truck, great price for the speed and build.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, this thing is fast. Well built too. Had a small problem, but customer service (from the company that made it), was way, way beyond quick, helpful, and generous. Goes fast on the sidewalk or blacktop, and just a little slower on the grass. Climbs steep grades, and takes a tumble well. All kinds of upgrades you can make to it, if you want, otherwise, we love it just the way it is! Modular design, sturdy uniframe with bumpers built in, easy on and off clips for the body and battery. Hopefully my son will really play with it a lot, like he did on Christmas, and I can get one too to race him!
customer_reviews.author: reflectionmommy

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use but screws keep falling out
customer_reviews.text: The car runs great and is a lot of fun to use. However, after a couple days of use the front steering rod and several screws fell out and got lost. I exchanged the car with a new one from Amazon (very easy process by the way) and the exact same thing happened again. This time I found the steering rod but the screws are missing and now I need to buy replacements. I get that these toys are high performing and things break down, but they shouldn't break down so easily and on such a fundamental piece of the car as the steering. The car is inoperable until it's fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good starter RC
customer_reviews.text: Very good starter RC. New to this with my 10 year old son. My philosophy was I buy the car, you pay for repairs and upgrades. Not sure how far he will be interested. But this is superior to the department store toys. Truck is pretty tough. We clocked it at 18 mph on pavement. Flys across grass no problem. Replacement parts and upgrades available. My only complaint is The battery duration is low. Less than 20 mins First thing to buy is a rapid charger and 5000 mah batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taormina

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these trucks to race around the yard. They are a good value for $150 but there is a lot of plastic. When things break, which they will, they aren't fun to fix. It's not really worth it to upgrade to aluminum parts. If you plan to use your RC vehicle a lot, it's worth paying up for a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great truck. Just be aware there is NO user manual.
customer_reviews.text: The truck is a good toy. I purchased for my nephew as b.day gift. The problem, I had was that it came in without any instruction, NO user manual at all. I had to go find a how to video on Utube to find out how to turn this thing on. However once I figured out the toy seem to work perfectly and performs great!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: personal expectations make this a worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: This R/C truck is everything I expected it to be. I read a lot of reviews and did my research on many different vehicles and chose this one. Is there faster rc vehicles than this one ,,,, yes ... will others say mine is better than yours... of course, Everyone who has said such things or brag about how fast theirs is all i do is look at all the replacement parts that they have put on and mine is still 100% stock. Faster is not my priority, durability has a much higher standing in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Obviously I'm very disappointed with this truck
customer_reviews.text: After charging all night, the truck ran anemically for about 4 minutes, then died. So far, a 2 hour wall charge gives 2-4 minutes of performance on par with the $39 Walmart imitation rc cars....slow and unexciting. I'll try a different charger to try and salvage this purchase, but honestly, for the price, an adequate charger should have been included. If this doesn't fix the problem, then the vehicle itself is substandard. Obviously I'm very disappointed with this truck.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad steering design
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except for the steering keeps coming loose - about every 5 minutes of use or less. Its where the servo is connected to the linkage there is a round nut that if loosened you can't steer at all. A very poor design as it comes loose frequently no matter how tight you make it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Rex

customer_reviews.title: It goes pretty fast and seems to be made well
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew loves this truck. I would suggest buying extra batteries(and rated higher), cause they don't last but about 15 mins max. It goes pretty fast and seems to be made well. It comes with a banana style hookup for batteries, so make sure to buy a banana adapter if you buy batteries with a different connector. Make sure you have a wide open space to drive this truck, especially for young kids. Very good buy!!!! Will update after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Great for beginners. My son is 12 and loves it. I suggest getting an extra battery, he drives it till it dies and is very impatient.
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh King

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance! Incredibly fun to drive
customer_reviews.text: Amazing performance! Incredibly fun to drive! The only downside so far is broken turnbuckles on the back wheels. They are used to control the camber of the wheels. They are plastic and metal, and the metal rips out of the plastic easily. They are upgradable, so I ordered some aluminum replacements. The battery included is a bit small, only 1800 mah, and the charger is slow. I am using a 3600 mah Tenergy unit with a Tenergy charger that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: L. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: worked for 4 runs
customer_reviews.text: fun truck, held up for about 4 runs, no jumps, or flips done just standard running up a street and in our yard. on the 5th run the drive train stopped working battery lasted approx 20 minutes each time
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Get bigger batteries,  they last longer.
customer_reviews.text: GrandKids and adult kids loved it. Very fast, got 3800 batteries, still not enough run time. Steering needed too made stronger, and axles beefed up. Great fun, for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money, I waited over a year from purchase to rate this truck. I still run it like crazy. I chased goats out of my yard with it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Battery life isn't like I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bagtefy life sucks. After charging for 8 hrs it will only run for 20 or 30 mins, which the company said is a good run time, but I feel it should run longer than that. My kids are just getting into playing and having fun and it dies. My older sons won't go in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Nicole Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome truck I looked and looked got this one and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome truck I looked and looked got this one and I am very happy with it,I have had more fun with this jewel then any of my other hobbies would recommend this to anyone starting out in RC its just fun,put a lipo battery in it and its unreal love it
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I new I was getting a used one, but when I pulled it out of the package the rear wheel fell away from the axle and the was clearly a broken piece and missing parts. I already own a volcano so I know they are good begginer cars but it would have cost me more to fix than I saved.... Just buy the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great truck for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great truck for the money! Is well constructed and good quality and yes I own Traxxas & Team Associated so I know what is good vs cheap. I highly recomend a 5000mah 2S Lipo Battery, it will transform the truck and the fun will be way longer
customer_reviews.author: YoYo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slower then i expected but you get what you pay for. I upgraded the motor to brushless and it screams broke parts left and right but parts are easy to replace plus a lot of upgrades. Only thing is it seems to break one new thing every time I play with it from broken wheels to arms shocks to everything
customer_reviews.author: Chong Chang

customer_reviews.title: Breaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad truck but converted it to brushless and was racing on a track once Or twice a week. Broke a lot, upgraded almost everything to aluminum and finally got rid of it because I was always fixing something. It was a good truck when it was running good it was keeping up with it beating the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and does not break like other reviews. Just cant drive it into walls. Made multiple jumps with it and only really needed to tighten some screws down. Even bent the suspension and just took it apart and bent it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great truck, easy to use and instructions that explain ...
customer_reviews.text: Great truck, easy to use and instructions that explain things very clearly. Mine came with a bent wheel, but not an issue; planning on upgrading them anyways. Super fast, but recommend buying a 4000Mah or bigger battery for longer run times. Would highly recommend as a quick easy way to get started in the R/C hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Great car for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great RC for kids. The battery life is a 2 hour charge for 10 min play. Standard for these I guess. Car runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy! I would buy this again 100%! Plus Amazon replaced my first delivery because the device was defective. But they got a new one to my front door in two days and it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Peck

customer_reviews.title: Can upgrade this already great RC truck!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great begginer RC truck. The 2000mah battery runs truck about 10 mins full out. Just charge a few spare batteries up and it's loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Don’t buy misleading open box items
customer_reviews.text: Beware of open box items... I was actually wanting and expecting to get an open box return item, but I figured all the parts would be there. I just wanted to try out a modern affordable RC truck. First of all, my order came from Warehouse Deals, Inc, and was labeled Used/Like new, which wasn’t true at all. The truck arrived without a NiMH battery, charger, missing linkage screws, missing front-end universal joints for 4wheel drive... basically DOA. So, beware of what you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good 1st RC for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Very good 1st RC to get youngsters out of the house and outside in the sunlight. RC can take a hit and keep going. Brushed power doesn't destroy the diffs like brushless power does.
customer_reviews.author: Fordfreak95

customer_reviews.title: Awesome truck
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion This is a great truck I'm fairly new to RC driving but this is a great looking truck Great quality I have upgraded the battery for more speed and longer run times I've heard lots of negative reviews on this truck but I disagree It's a good price well packaged and runs great Pretty fast RC for a beginner into RC I am very well pleased with my purchase buy it and see for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Grant B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: I give this a rating of 1 because 2 out of the three I bought for my grandsons Christmas gifts DO NOT work. Also the batteries are in lasting 20 minutes. They will not go forward or in reverse. I will be returning these products to Amazon. So far the other one is working but will return it also if it starts failing to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi0527

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny spent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son he loves it. He drives it in tall grass, in water puddles, gravel roads, jumps ditches. I would purchase again if needed. Looking to upgrade tires for him and bigger battery. It does run pretty fast so not intended for small child
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of a truck
customer_reviews.text: Great little truck! It’s very powerful, we had it kicking up leaves and jumping off rocks. It’s durable with good suspension, and the plastic cover comes off in case it needs to be cleaned. Definitely a great buy and the highlight of Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than woodpecker lips! Not impressed with the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Tougher than woodpecker lips! Not impressed with the battery though.. keep in mind when reading other reviews if you drive your car into a tree at 25 mph it'll break, so will this truck!
customer_reviews.author: jrxj95

customer_reviews.title: Great place to start, and learn to fix...
customer_reviews.text: Expect some small parts to break, especially the front wheel hubs. The plus is the upgrade(more durable) parts are available and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. The thing goes anywhere. Really nice. Battery lasts about 20 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Anywho

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kids around 10yrs
customer_reviews.text: Good product unlike the Blackout - just the 2000mAh battery is far too small and the charger that comes with it is not good. So buy an extra 5000mAh and a good charger. The car is stable and good to control. If you're new to such RC cars make sure you've got som tools at hom to tighten screws etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truck is great,I need my functional controller.
customer_reviews.text: The truck is great,I got it bogged down in tall grass.my controller won't go into reverse,the push forward portion of the trigger responds very sporatic.can I look at it? inside?
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this truck, and he abuses the heck out of it and hasn't broken anything yet. I grew up driving an RC10; this truck compares in quality and is a steal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got the truck controller didn't work made a call it was replaced with no hassle. My 9yo son loves it it was a great buy, well made, awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: For kids only
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this for anyone over 10 years old. Very very slow, very cheap feeling and flimsy. Remote felt sold. But full speed was about a jogging pace. Back passenger wheel wobbled badly. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Jaqleen

customer_reviews.title: get ECX Circuit Stadium instead WAY better
customer_reviews.text: broke first run, get ECX Circuit Stadium instead WAY better quality
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rael

customer_reviews.title: Fun to drive but plan spending additional money
customer_reviews.text: The truck is fun to drive but the charger sent with it is junk. Wires pulled out on connector after first charge. I don't even think this charger was designed to charge rc batteries. It said travel charger on it and the wires were very thin. That being said, I go to my local hobby store to buy a new charger and they tell me that no one will carry the type of wire connectors on the truck and battery supplied. So after spending $25 on new charger I had to spend an additional $10 on new wire connectors. The truck is fun to drive and is upgradeable, but plan on spending additional money from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: brian noll

customer_reviews.title: Love this truck
customer_reviews.text: Love this truck, I live on an island and it's hard to get rc cars and trucks. I have put alot of upgrades in to it and it is a fun truck.
customer_reviews.author: RCTruckRunner

customer_reviews.title: O.k. truck. Should've got the pro.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent truck for the money. If I were to buy again I would go for the pro. Not super fast or durable. I picked up the 1/18 version also and it's a lot more fun! It's faster and has taken a major beating with nothing broken.....yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Contacted manufacture they got back to me wanted a video of what was going. I sent video with narration of issues. Crickets, no response, resent several times no response!!!! If they are closed they need to let us know.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  Andrew McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It is a great RC vehicle for the price. However, the battery life is extremely short.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Drayer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I didn't like was that the body of the truck seems really ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. He says the 4 wheel drive is a big plus to him compared to models he's had in the past that didn't have that. The only thing I didn't like was that the body of the truck seems really cheap and flimsy. We will just have to get a higher quality body to put on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: ShiJess

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: 4WD! Amazing. Battery life could be better, but that is a simple upgrade. This truck continues to surprise me with what it can do!
customer_reviews.author: metalthrashinman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Remote control Truck
customer_reviews.text: I have to say..... not bad for a remote control car ... I'M A BIG FAN OF REMOTE CONTROL CARS...
customer_reviews.author: JcmMavic

customer_reviews.title: Great truck!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you won't get a better truck! Put at least a 3800mah battery in it and you'll get above average speed and torque. If you put $100 into this truck with aluminum parts and other upgrades and it will be as good as any rc truck over $400. People have to remember this is more than a toy...it's gonna break/malfunction etc. but that's what makes it fun you learn how to fix it and fix it better. You can turn this good truck into a outstanding truck with little investment. Redcat is awesome and for hard to find parts just go to redcatracing.com.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great RC
customer_reviews.text: Excellant for the price and very sturdily built. Not as fast as others we've tried, but cross country is not supposed to be race car fast. Great RC!
customer_reviews.author: snake61

customer_reviews.title: Fast, fun, affordable, and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fast, good battery life, seems to be good build quality, wrecked it several times and it's still fine, and it's waterproof! Ran it in the snow and it still works. Awesome RC for $140!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t run unless pushed first
customer_reviews.text: Would only run when pushed. Had gras blades in the box and the truck. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Stlblues

customer_reviews.title: nice truck for the money
customer_reviews.text: The truck was ok I got the brushed motor and upgrade to a brushless motor and esc and the spur gear does not last so a steel one is the way to go there's lots of upgrade for the volcano exp at lower prices so I can upgrade slow as I fined the weak points
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Truck!! Requires Lots of Maintenance!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Truck! Hd to order better battery. These trucks require Lots of maintenance! Nit for kids without an adult who can maintain it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good truck
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains fast is really the only complaint. Other then that it's good for beginner teens/ adults definitely not for a kid. Great to pass time with, pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Great truck great price
customer_reviews.text: Have other RC cars and trucks, this one is as good as Traxxas and has gotten you used hard.Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Russell E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend a 3800 nimh at the minimum it only comes with a 2000nimh. And upgrade the charger but good beginners truck not cheap junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Kkustomz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Need better instructions for beginners. It travels well over dirt and small rocks but flips over easily if you make too sharp of a turn.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing..
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing....it's goes just like the video shows. It travels over everything! My 8 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Great truck for price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Seems durable. I would recommend a better battery with longer life. Easy to use. I let my six year old run it. It’s a great entry level hobby grade rc truck
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: yes this a fun truck for the buck
customer_reviews.text: SO for all who want to know, yes this a fun truck for the buck. I PURCHASED THIS FOR MY 13 YR OLD WHO HAS C.P. AND EVEN HE HAS ONLY BENT 1 SHOCK! I simply wanted to enter the rc world without buying a ridiculously priced item and have been thoroughly pleased with this product. The bent shock will be replaced for 12$. So to see a special needs kid smile as much as he does when driving this truck, I say thank you Redcat!! Great buy and highly recommended for any newcomers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is 1 of 3 that I purchased for Christmas and only one 1 of the 3 has successfully worked. The price is right but the quality and reliability simply isn’t there. Find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Good Baseline monster truck Redcat did it again
customer_reviews.text: Underpowered not severely though suspension very bouncy and Battery takes too long to charge with supplied charger with lithium 3 cell it is a lot faster I put in a 3700 KV brushless motor and it flies
customer_reviews.author: Dialedin

customer_reviews.title: redcat volcano epx
customer_reviews.text: the shipping was great and the truck is pritty cool. but one of the wheels wobbles alot and the truck is really under powered. will really have to up grade to brushless and get all aluminum upgrades. other than that the truck is still awsome. i also had to drill new holes in the body to mount it further back on the chassis. due to the body over hanging the front bumper by about half an inch.
customer_reviews.author: cj620

customer_reviews.title: Good truck for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Ran 3 battery packs through it twice. I am impressed. This this is great out of the box! I already upgraded the spur gear right away because of some reviews. It is plastic.i would definitely buy a couple 3800mh batteries so you can hive time to have fun with it without waiting for the long charge time. Only one complaint, the charger isn't working. Luckily I also bought a smart charger. All in all it seems pretty good. My son is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This truck is great! I just received it today and ran it through 2 batteries and am very impressed with the performance (it is comparable to a traxxas stampede).
customer_reviews.author: Grant Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: The volcano car is fun, but only worked for 3 rides. Tried buying another battery but did not work. Be aware that it might frustate your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Abreu Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Low cost
customer_reviews.text: Cheap truck ran great for the first day after that the stock motor brunt up with the battery it came with so spend more money on better truck
customer_reviews.author: 573 forest

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this truck
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this truck. I have had to replace parts but that is because he is very hard on it. Good thing is parts are pretty cheap and readily available.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Loved it when it ran
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when it ran, but after only a few uses we had to send it back because it broke in several different places.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: My 7 yo sun was thrilled to receive this for ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo sun was thrilled to receive this for his birthday. It is tough enough to climb over logs and up and down the muddy hills of our trail through the woods. Only complaint is short battery life - needs charging after 20 minutes of drive time.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bauerlein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome redcat rc truck.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with truck and remote. Truck looks great and remote is very comfortable. Rc truck is very fast, battery was fast to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Besinaiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome truck my 4 year old has a blast driving ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome truck my 4 year old has a blast driving it. Durable so far, haven't had to replace any parts yet
customer_reviews.author: Seagulls

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son on september 12th. 2 weeks of bashing everyday and it has absolutely held up through it all. Small puddles and running into curbs. Definitely worth the buy. Good first time RC car.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Romero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this. It is fast and furious and has excellent handling ability. I never saw anything like this when I was a kid. They have come so far with RC cars, it's unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Woodie

customer_reviews.title: Nice RC
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and this truck exceeds my expectations. Well built and pretty quick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

product_meta.title: Redcat Racing Volcano EPX Electric Truck, Blue/Silver, 1/10 Scale
product_meta.description: Color:Blue/Silver| Item Package Quantity:1The VOLCANO exp is an electrifying four-wheel drive monster truck that is ready to run right out of the box! Get started in this exciting hobby with this bold RC vehicle, complete with an electric brushed 27T 540 motor, forward/reverse transmission, four wheel drive, High torque servo and a two channel Am radio. Equipped with an aggressively styled polycarbonate body scheme, huge soft compound RC off road tread, aluminum capped oil filled shocks, battery and charger, This vehicle is a mini eruption of enjoyment for any level RC enthusiast. Add 8 AA batteries to the remote and you are ready to conquer the toughest terrain!
feature_bullets: 4WD Monster truck w/ Large monster truck tires, Lightweight molded plastic chassis, (8) Aluminum capped oil filled shocks, front and rear gear differentials.
Tunable suspension, Adjustable ride height, Tunable shocks, Tunable gear differentials, Adjustable camber, Adjustable toe angle. Speed Control: 40a Brushed Waterproof ESC
Aggressive tires, Independent suspension, Low center of gravity chassis for high speed performance, Ball bearings throughout.
19T brushed 550 electric motor with heat sink, Waterproof ESC, Waterproof high torque steering servo, 2.4GHz radio system.

Assembled & Ready to Run - Includes 7.2V 2000mAh NiMH Battery & NiMH Charger - Requires 4-AA Batteries for Transmitter. Please contact Red Cat Racing for troubleshooting issues & other product working related queries at 602-454-6445 or support@redcatracing.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars618 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
